sense.def:
Kadar obstaja
a risk of something unpleasant
, obstaja možnost, da se zgodi nekaj neprijetnega.

seg.quote: There is very little risk of infection.
...the risk that their men might disappear without trace.

sense.def:
Kar je
a risk
, ima lahko nevarne ali neprijetne posledice.

seg.quote: Such a response would be an irrational risk.
Your television is a fire risk if left plugged in overnight.

sense.def:
To risk something unpleasant
pomeni narediti nekaj, čeprav vemo, da ima to lahko neprijetne posledice.

seg.quote: They were willing to risk losing their jobs.

sense.def:
To risk an action
pomeni, da nekaj naredimo, čeprav vemo, da utegne imeti nezaželene posledice.

seg.quote: If you have an expensive rug, don't risk washing it yourself.

sense.def:
To risk someone's life
pomeni nekoga postaviti v nevaren položaj, v katerem tvega življenje.

seg.quote: She had risked her life to help save mine.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
at risk
, je v položaju, ko se mu lahko zgodi kaj neprijetnega ali nevarnega.

seg.quote: You're putting my career at risk.

sense.def:
To do something at one's own risk
pomeni, da bo v primeru, da se nekomu kaj zgodi, odgovornost za to samo njegova.

To run the risk of doing or experiencing something
pomeni, da se zavestno odločimo, da bomo nekaj naredili, čeprav vemo, da ima lahko nezaželene ali nevarne posledice.

seg.quote: We run the risk of confusing the voters.

sense.def:
To take a risk
pomeni narediti nekaj, za kar vemo, da utegne biti nevarno.

seg.quote: I am taking a tremendous risk.
